text: DQVI may not be my favorite DQ but it has some amazing tracks.
author: Edward

text: Have you tried out Dragon Quest Heroes?
author: Alex Baker

text:
DQ6 is one my favourite video games and especially the NDS remake which is great
But the final boss deathtamor is awfully strong! Even with two dragons fully grown in my team, I have difficulties beating him it's awesome!
author: actinid14

text: I've been wanting to get into Dragon Quest. Does anyone know a good starting point (BTW the only consoles I have is a Wii, Wii U, GBA, D.S., 3D.S., and PS4
author: Some Gut

text: I would say dq iv is a really good start for the DS.  iv-vi is a trilogy and I would play them in that order
author: jasondm300

text: Sugiyama's music always gives me a nostalgic feeling, eventhough I barely played any games composed by Sugiyama, except some Dragon Quests and E.V.O.
author: Owari Dragon

text: My favorite of the series, but I still have to play IV, V VII and VIII, really can't wait to get those games, especially since I hear some of them are better than VI, also the music in VI is just awesome, especially in the DS remake
author: Dimoskid

text: +Dimoskid IV, V, VII, VIII are really awesome, I'm sure your mind will be blown away ! <3
author: Noctoregis

text: Personally, i thought 6 was the weakest out of the trilogy, but still a fun and amazingly huge game with great music.
author: crono686

text: Just another awesome Sugiyama town theme. Everytime I listen to DQ music, I feel like starting a new file. Games in this series are big "comfort games" for me, I feel right at home when playing them, always knowing what to expect. I'm looking forward to DQ11 on 3DS/NX/PS4.
author: SupraDarky

text: I also look forward to Dragon Quest XI. I loved Dragon Quest IX, which remains to this day as one of my favorite games ever, and I hope this new one will be able to have the same impact on me. It's a shame you don't have more music from that game on your list.
author: DScribbleF
